descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Between
options.description: Field is between two values ('From' is inclusive, 'To' is exclusive)

options.name: Contains
options.description: Field contains the substring from value

options.name: Ends With
options.description: Field ends with value

options.name: Equal
options.description: Field is equal to value

options.name: Greater Than
options.description: Field is greater than value

options.name: Greater Than Or Equal To
options.description: Field is greater than or equal to value

options.name: In
options.description: Field is one of the values

options.name: Less Than
options.description: Field is less than value

options.name: Less Than Or Equal To
options.description: Field is less than or equal to value

options.name: Match Word
options.description: Field contains the value as a word

options.name: Not Equal
options.description: Field is not equal to value

options.name: Starts With
options.description: Field starts with value

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

queryJson.description: Search for objects with filtering and sorting capabilities
queryJson.hint: The query should be an array of operations with the required selection and optional filtering, sorting, and pagination. See Query API for more information.
queryJson.ai_hint: Search for objects with filtering and sorting capabilities

allCases.name: allCases
allCases.description: Whether to search in all cases or only in a selected case

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertFields'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableUi'
IF dataType == 'file' THEN HIDE parameter 'data'
IF dataType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'deleteAlert' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF id == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF /resource IN ["alert", "case", "comment", "task", "observable", "log", "page"] THEN HIDE parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF /resource == 'page' THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF operator IN ["_between", "_in"] THEN HIDE parameter 'value'
IF operator == '_in' THEN SHOW parameter 'values'
IF operator == '_between' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF operator == '_between' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /returnAll == False THEN HIDE parameter 'returnCount'
IF /resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF returnCount == True THEN HIDE parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'alert' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF /resource == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'extraData'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'status' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'status' THEN SHOW parameter 'status'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'merge' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'merge' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'promote' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'promote' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'alert' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'case' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'addAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'addAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsUi'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'addAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseFields'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'deleteAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'deleteAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'deleteCase' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'case' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'getTimeline' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'case' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'addTo'
IF addTo == 'case' AND resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF addTo == 'alert' AND resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'deleteComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchIn'
IF searchIn == 'case' AND resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF searchIn == 'alert' AND resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'addAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'logId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'addAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsUi'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'logFields'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsUi'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'deleteAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'logId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'deleteAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'deleteLog' THEN SHOW parameter 'logId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'logId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'allTasks'
IF allTasks == False AND resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'observable' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'createIn'
IF createIn == 'case' AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF createIn == 'alert' AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataType'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF dataType == 'file' AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsUi'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableFields'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'deleteObservable' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableId'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeAnalyzer' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableId'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeAnalyzer' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataType'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeAnalyzer' THEN SHOW parameter 'analyzers'
IF id == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'analyzers'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableId'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchIn'
IF searchIn == 'case' AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF searchIn == 'alert' AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'alertId'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'observable' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'observableUpdateFields'
IF resource == 'page' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF location == 'case' AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'category'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'deletePage' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF location == 'case' AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'deletePage' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'deletePage' THEN SHOW parameter 'pageId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchInKnowledgeBase'
IF searchInKnowledgeBase == False AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF returnAll == True AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'location'
IF location == 'case' AND resource == 'page' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'pageId'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'page' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'query' AND operation == 'executeQuery' THEN SHOW parameter 'queryJson'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'deleteTask' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'executeResponder' THEN SHOW parameter 'responder'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'allCases'
IF allCases == False AND resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'caseId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskUpdateFields'
